Name: Default Stamp
Note: A stamp that uses hearts but does not have a PackageId. Id is fixed to 0. Order is fixed to start at 0.

Name: Event Stamp
Description: Can be obtained by participating in limited-time or festival events
Note: Adopted the Empyrea Portrait, limited-time event stamp library

Name: Achievement Stamp
Description: Evolve the character to SSS to obtain the special stamp.
